None.Name: Cannon Turrets
None.Description: Every 2 seconds, 4 turrets deal 80 damage each to enemies in 5m radius, up to 120 total.

None.Name: Barrage
None.Description: Activate to release 5 shots each shot dealing 420 damage to enemies in 12 radius, up to 2500 in total. Knocks back small units. Only affects ground targets. Reusable every 30 seconds.
